templates.template: <if test="query.${ids} != null and query.${ids}.size() > 0"> AND ${id} IN <foreach collection="query.${ids}" item="item" open="(" separator="," close=")"> #{item} </foreach> </if>

template.description: mybatis if string like query tag
template.name: iflike

templates.template: <if test="query.${name} != null and query.${name} != '' "> <bind name="${name}Like" value=" '%'+ query.${name} + '%' " /> AND a.${column} = #{${name}Like} </if>

<if test="query.${name} != null and query.${name} != '' ">
				AND a.${column} = #{query.${name}}
			</if>
